p: Milk was collected in 15-m l plastic tubes, and centrifuged at 3,000 rpm for 10 min at 4Â°C. Milk somatic cells from the bottom of the tubes (i.e., cell pellets) were then washed with phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) and re-pelleted. All cell pellets were used for ribonucleic acid (RNA) extraction.
